header: The Parable of the Lost Sheep

verse: Now the tax collectors and sinners were all drawing near to hear him.
And the Pharisees and the scribes grumbled, saying, “This man receives sinners and eats with them.”
So he told them this parable:

header: The Parable of the Lost Coin
The Parable of the Prodigal Son

verse: And he said, “There was a man who had two sons.
